column4: Just confirming that there is no commandline upgrade to intrepid, not nagging, just using a horribly inaccessible IRC client and this room is busy, might have missed the answer.
you can try aptitude update; aptitude dist-upgrade
I tried apt-get update apt-get dist-upgrade with no luck.  is hat the same?
Yeah. You must have intrepid in /etc/apt/sources.list, instead of what distribution you have now.
